nodes.text: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back (Screen Comix)

Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back is a graphic novel adaptation of the film of the same name, illustrated by Neil Erickson with dialogue from the film. It was published by Random House on October 27, 2020 as part of the Screen Comix series.
Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back Screen Comix is a graphic novel-style retelling with full-color images and dialogue from the film!

The epic space saga, Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back, is retold in the new Screen Comix format-right on time for the 40th anniversary of the film! After the destruction of the Death Star, the Empire has regrouped--with Darth Vader leading the hunt for Luke Skywalker, Princess Leia, Han Solo, and the Rebels. Featuring final frames and dialogue from the movie in vibrant full color, this 320-page graphic novel-style retelling will delight fans of all ages.
